senses.sense_definition: Of, from, or relating to the country of Afghanistan, its people, or its culture.

examples.text: The <w>Afghan</w> government has introduced new policies this year.
We enjoyed a traditional <w>Afghan</w> meal with rice and lamb.

senses.sense_definition: Of, from, or pertaining to the Pashtun ethnic community.

examples.text: The museum displayed artifacts from <w>Afghan</w> tribes of the region.
Scholars studied the <w>Afghan</w> dialects spoken in the border areas.

senses.sense_definition: A native or inhabitant of Afghanistan; a person of Afghan citizenship or nationality.

examples.text: Many <w>Afghans</w> have moved abroad to find safety and work.
He is an <w>Afghan</w> who is very proud of his heritage.

senses.sense_definition: A blanket or throw, usually crocheted or knitted from colorful yarn.

examples.text: She wrapped herself in a warm <w>afghan</w> while watching television.
My grandmother knitted a beautiful <w>afghan</w> for the sofa.

senses.sense_definition: A tall dog breed with long, silky hair and a distinctive curved tail; short for Afghan Hound.

examples.text: The <w>Afghan</w> requires daily grooming to keep its coat tangle-free.
We saw a prize-winning <w>Afghan</w> at the dog show.

senses.sense_definition: A type of carpet or rug traditionally made in Afghanistan, known for specific patterns.

examples.text: They bought a red <w>Afghan</w> to cover the floor in the hallway.
An authentic <w>Afghan</w> can be quite expensive due to the craftsmanship.

senses.sense_definition: A type of iced chocolate biscuit, sometimes containing cornflakes and topped with a walnut.

examples.text: She baked a batch of <w>afghans</w> for the school bake sale.
The crunchy texture of the <w>afghan</w> comes from the cornflakes inside.

senses.sense_definition: The Pashto language, primarily spoken by Pashtun people.

examples.text: He is learning to speak <w>Afghan</w> to communicate with the locals.
Some historical texts refer to the language simply as <w>Afghan</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A short informal name for the country of Afghanistan.

examples.text: He will be deployed in <w>Afghan</w> for another six months.
The soldiers returned from <w>Afghan</w> last week.
